title: KinOS v7 WebSocket Integration
content:
# KinOS v7 WebSocket Integration

## Overview
Implement WebSocket connections in KinOS v7 to reduce response times for gaming interactions, building on existing codebase at https://github.com/Lesterpaintstheworld/your-character-lives.

## Requirements

1. WebSocket Server
- Basic WebSocket endpoint
- Connection handling
- Error recovery
- Simple health checks
- Integration with existing game interaction code

2. API Keys
- One key per user
- Basic usage tracking
- Simple rate limiting

3. Performance
- Target <100ms response time
- Support 1000 concurrent users
- Basic error logging

4. User Management
- User database (MongoDB)
- Track daily usage
- Store API keys
- Usage limits:
  * Max 1000 requests/day
  * Max 100 concurrent connections
  * Max 10MB data transfer/day

## Implementation Steps

1. Fork and analyze existing codebase
2. Set up WebSocket server
3. Add API key validation
4. Implement usage tracking
5. Add basic monitoring
6. Create user database
7. Add usage limits

## Success Criteria
- Working WebSocket connections
- Response time under 100ms
- Proper error handling
- Usage tracking working
- User limits enforced
- Maintains existing game interaction functionality
